topics.body: I just finished reading 43 chapters of Mob Psycho 100. (I don't like it quite as much as One-punch man. But I still like it.)

topics.body:
Between Pat, Woolie, and Max I REALLY wanna learn more about fighting games.
But I suuuuuuuuuuuuuuuck at fighting games super hard.

topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5556b18d6368721c12560000#post_5556b18d6368721c12560000
I can do combos if I have a stick. It's just all the other shit that I lose it. When dudes start talking about rekkas, and DPs, and frame data and shit my mind just goes blank.
